name: Angriff
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

<BP Repeat>
<Counter Name: Eye for an Eye>

clear battle log
display action

perform start

wait for movement
face user: target

<target action>

wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait: 10
action effect
wait: 10
</target action>

<follow action>
wait for animation

description:
\c[27]Meister Skill:\c[0] für 3 Runden, werden Fähigkeiten, die von
einem Verbündeten gewirkt werden, der normalerweise allen Feinden Schaden zufügt, konzentrieren sich stattdessen auf einen einzelnen Feind mit erhöhter Intensität.
name: Erleuchtung
note:
<Divine>
<Require 3 BP>

description:
Sammelt Geld von einem Feind. Die Trefferrate hängt
von der Aktuellen HP des Feindes ab. Trefferrate \c[27]+\bp=0[5]\bp=1[33]\bp=2[67]\bp=3[100]%\c[0].
name: Sammeln
note:
<Before Eval>
var text = '<CENTER>';
if (!target._isMoneyCollected && target.isEnemy()) {
    var rate = [0.05, 0.33, 0.67, 1.0][user.bp] + 1 - target.hpRate();
    if (Math.random() < rate) {
        target._isMoneyCollected = true;
        SoundManager.playShop();
        var gold = target.gold();
        $gameParty.gainGold(gold);
        text += 'Collected ' + gold + ' ' + TextManager.currencyUnit;
    } else {
        text += 'Failed to collect';
    }
} else {
    text += 'Already collected'
}
text += ' from ' + target.name() + '!';
BattleManager.addText(text, 60);
</Before Eval>

perform start
motion standby: user
wait for movement
face user: targets
</whole action>

<target action>
motion skill: user
wait: 10
action animation: target
wait: 10
action effect
</target action>

wait for animation
<follow action>

\c[27]\bpdamage[100]%\c[0] Multiplikator.
name: Tausend Speere
note:
<Boost Damage>
<Switch to Weapon: Spear>

<Custom Target Text>
text = '5 to 10 Random Enemies';
</Custom Target Text>

<Custom Target Eval>
var times = 5 + Math.randomInt(6);
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
while (times--) {
    var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
    targets.push(member);
}
</Custom Target Eval>

description: Verursacht \c[27]\bprepeat[1]\c[0] Zufälligen Effekt\bp[s].
name: Verwildernde Gnade
note:
<BP Repeat>
<Bypass Target Change>

<setup action>
</setup action>

<whole action>
eval: $gameVariables.setValue(4, BattleManager._subject.bp)
</whole action>

<target action>
clear battle log
display action
motion victory: user
action animation: user
wait for animation
if $gameVariables.value(4) === 0
  eval: console.log(0)
  common event: 1
else if $gameVariables.value(4) === 1
  eval: console.log(1)
  common event: 2
else if $gameVariables.value(4) === 2
  eval: console.log(2)
  common event: 3
else if $gameVariables.value(4) === 3
  eval: console.log(3)
  common event: 4
end
</target action>

description:
\c[27]Meister Skill:\c[0] Für 3 Runden, gelten Items die von 
einem Verbündetem Benutzt werden für die ganze Gruppe.
name: Nächstenliebe
note:
<Divine>
<Require 3 BP>

description:
Stiehlt ein Item von einem Feind.
Trefferrate \c[27]+\bp=0[5]\bp=1[33]\bp=2[67]\bp=3[100]%\c[0].
name: Stehlen
note:
<Before Eval>
var text = '<CENTER>';
if (!target._isItemStolen && target.isEnemy()) {
    var rate = [0.05, 0.33, 0.67, 1.0][user.bp] + 1 - target.hpRate();
    var items = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < target.enemy().dropItems.length; i++) {
        var dropItem = target.enemy().dropItems[i];
        if (dropItem.kind === 1) {
            items.push($dataItems[dropItem.dataId]);
        } else if (dropItem.kind === 2) {
            items.push($dataWeapons[dropItem.dataId]);
        } else if (dropItem.kind === 3) {
            items.push($dataArmors[dropItem.dataId]);
        }
    }
    if (Math.random() < rate && items.length > 0) {
        target._isItemStolen = true;
        SoundManager.playUseItem();
        var item = items[Math.floor(Math.random() * items.length)];
        $gameParty.gainItem(item);
        text += 'Stole ' + item.name;
    } else {
        text += 'Failed to steal';
    }
} else {
    text += 'Already stolen'
}
text += ' from ' + target.name() + '!';
BattleManager.addText(text, 60);
</Before Eval>

<whole action>
perform start
motion standby: user
wait for movement
face user: targets
</whole action>

<target action>

wait: 10
action effect
</target action>

description:
Attack all foes 5 to 8 times with a bow.
\c[27]\bpdamage[100]%\c[0] Multiplier.
name: Arrow Storm
note:
<Boost Damage>
<Switch to Weapon: Bow>

<whole action>
face user: targets
eval: $gameVariables.setValue(1, Math.randomInt(4))

if $gameVariables.value(1) >= 1
  motion attack: user
  wait: 10
  animation 6: targets
  wait: 10
  action animation: targets
  wait: 10
  action effect
end

if $gameVariables.value(1) >= 2
  motion attack: user
  wait: 10
  animation 6: targets
  wait: 10
  action animation: targets
  wait: 10
  action effect
end

if $gameVariables.value(1) >= 3
  motion attack: user
  wait: 10
  animation 6: targets
  wait: 10
  action animation: targets
  wait: 10
  action effect
end

description:
\c[27]Divine Skill:\c[0] Unleash a non-elemental attack on all foes that deals 
damage proportional to the party's current BP.
name: Prophecy Burst
note:
<Divine>
<Require 3 BP>
<Boost Damage>

<Pre-Damage Eval>
var members = user.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();
var rate = 1;
for (var i = 0; i < members.length; i++) {
  var member = members[i];
  if (!!member && member.storedBP() > 0) {
    rate += 0.50 * member.storedBP();
  }
}
value = Math.round(rate * value);
</Pre-Damage Eval>

wait for animation
action animation: targets

description:
\c[27]Divine Skill:\c[0] For 3 turns, elemental attacks performed by a
single chosen ally will hit for critical damage.
name: Spellmaster
note:
<Divine>
<Require 3 BP>

name: Fiery Pursuit
note:
<Custom Target Eval>
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
for (var i = 0; i < members.length; i++) {
  var member = members[i];
  if (!!member && member._pursuit) {
    member._pursuit = false;
    targets.push(member);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

name: Icy Pursuit
note:
<Custom Target Eval>
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
for (var i = 0; i < members.length; i++) {
  var member = members[i];
  if (!!member && member._pursuit) {
    member._pursuit = false;
    targets.push(member);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

name: Shocking Pursuit
note:
<Custom Target Eval>
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
for (var i = 0; i < members.length; i++) {
  var member = members[i];
  if (!!member && member._pursuit) {
    member._pursuit = false;
    targets.push(member);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

name: Windy Pursuit
note:
<Custom Target Eval>

  var member = members[i];
  if (!!member && member._pursuit) {

    targets.push(member);

}

description:
Unleash \c[27]\bpRepeat[1]\c[0] sword attack\bp[s] on all foes, and 
augment DEF for all allies for \c[27]\bpTurn[1]\c[0] turns.
name: Mercenary
note:
<Custom Requirement>
value = $gameParty.gold() > 150;
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Execution>
$gameParty.loseGold(150);
</Custom Execution>

<Custom Cost Display>
150\c[27]\G\c[0]
</Custom Cost Display>

<whole action>
animation 127: user, mirror
motion spell: user
wait: 30
if BattleManager._subject.bp >= 0
  action animation: targets
  wait: 10
  action effect
end
if BattleManager._subject.bp >= 1
  action animation: targets
  wait: 10
  action effect
end
if BattleManager._subject.bp >= 2
  action animation: targets
  wait: 10
  action effect
end
if BattleManager._subject.bp >= 3
  action animation: targets
  wait: 10
  action effect
end
</whole action>

<target action>
</target action>

<follow action>
animation 53: all friends
if BattleManager._subject.bp === 0
  add DEF buff: all friends, 1
else if BattleManager._subject.bp === 1
  add DEF buff: all friends, 2
else if BattleManager._subject.bp === 2
  add DEF buff: all friends, 3
else if BattleManager._subject.bp === 3
  add DEF buff: all friends, 4
end
wait: 90
</follow action>

description:
Attack a single foe \c[27]\bpRepeat[1]\c[0] time\bp[s] with a sword.
Each hit delays struck foe for the current and next turns.

<BP Repeat>
<Switch to Weapon: Sword>
<OTB Target Current Turn: -1>
<OTB Target Next Turn: -1>
